mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_records (student_id, name, grade, major_id) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{name}, #{grade}, #{majorId})
mapper.select: SELECT course_id FROM student_completed_courses WHERE student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT OR IGNORE INTO student_completed_courses (student_id, course_id) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{courseId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM student_completed_courses WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND course_id = #{courseId}
